prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with sleek, futuristic features and bold colors.
Show me a mythical creature with a unique design, combining elements of technology and nature.
Imagine a legendary Pokemon that embodies speed and intelligence, with a striking color palette.
Generate a humanoid Pokemon with flowing shapes and a dynamic pose, showcasing its psychic powers.
Design a Pokemon that looks like it defies gravity, with an eye-catching mix of colors.
Give me a concept for a Pokemon that blends organic and robotic features seamlessly.
Make a depiction of a psychic Pokemon that has a mysterious aura and vibrant colors.
